text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 32.1. Alif-laam-meem 32.2. Bila shuba iss kitab ka utarna tamam jahano kay perwerdigar ki taraf say hai 32.3. Kiya yeh kehtay hain kay iss ney issay gharh liya hai. ( nahi nahi) bulkay yeh teray rab Taalaa ki taraf say haq hai takay aap unhen darayen jin kay pass aap say pehlay koi daraney wala nahi aaya takay woh raah-e-raast per aajyen 32.4. Allah Taalaa woh hai jiss ney aasmano-o- zamin ko aur jo kuch inn kay darmiyan hai sab ko cheh din mein pedah ker diya phir arsh per qaeem hua tumharay liye uss kay siwa koi madadgar aur sifarishi nahi. Kiya phir bhi tum naseehat hasil nahi kertay
